articles.description: Follow live text updates and 5 Live commentary from the Premier League with Liverpool and Arsenal both in action.
articles.title: Premier League: Liverpool host Palace & West Ham face Fulham

articles.description: Follow live text updates as Bayer Leverkusen host Werder Bremen knowing win will see them crowned Bundesliga champions with five games to spare.
articles.title: Bundesliga: Xhaka doubles lead as Leverkusen close in on title

articles.description: Listen to radio commentary and follow live text updates from the final day of The Masters from Augusta National Golf Club in Georgia, USA.
articles.title: The Masters LIVE: Final round - radio commentary, leaderboard & text updates

articles.description: Liverpool's Premier League title hopes suffer a huge blow as they fall to a 1-0 defeat by Crystal Palace at Anfield.
articles.title: Liverpool's title hopes hit by loss to Palace

articles.description: Stefanos Tsitsipas beat Casper Ruud to win the Monte Carlo Masters for the third time.
articles.title: Monte Carlo Masters: Stefanos Tsitsipas beats Casper Ruud to win third title

articles.description: Bayer Leverkusen end Bayern Munich's era of dominance and clinch their first Bundesliga title with five games to spare by beating Werder Bremen.
articles.title: Leverkusen win Bundesliga with five games to spare

articles.description: Max Holloway's final-second stoppage of Justin Gaethje at UFC 300 is described as the "KO of the century" by commentator Joe Rogan.
articles.title: UFC 300: Max Holloway beats Justin Gaethje with 'KO of the century'

articles.description: Scotland's Blair Kinghorn scores 23 points as five-time Investec Champions Cup winners Toulouse sweep aside Exeter to reach the semi-finals.
articles.title: Toulouse thrash Exeter to seal semi with Harlequins

articles.description: Manchester United beat Women's FA Cup holders Chelsea in a thrilling semi-final to set up a Wembley final against Tottenham on 12 May.
articles.title: Man Utd hold on to beat Chelsea and reach Wembley

articles.description: Follow live text updates as Arsenal face Bristol City in the Women's Super League at Meadow Park.
articles.title: WSL: Arsenal host bottom side Bristol City
